Newcomers really should steer clear though, if you must have a game based on assassinations, you would be better off seeking out Agent-47 instead.
X-Men: The Official Game is too short, too bland and too rushed to be considered anything more than a three-day rental (and barely that).
But boring combat is just one half of the misery pie that this game serves up, with half-baked role-playing elements comprising the rest.
Ballers is just too glitchy, ugly and frustrating to be worth even a rental.
